Package backend.tradesystem.queries

Class UserQuery

java.lang.Object
backend.tradesystem.Manager
backend.tradesystem.queries.UserQuery
public class UserQuery
extends Manager
For getting info about a specific user

      public UserQuery() throws java.io.IOException
      Create an instance of ItemQuery with preset file paths from Databse enum
      Throws:

    • UserQuery

      public UserQuery​(java.lang.String userFilePath, java.lang.String tradableItemFilePath, java.lang.String tradeFilePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Making the database objects with set file paths
      Parameters:
      userFilePath - the user database file path
      tradableItemFilePath - the tradable item database file path
      tradeFilePath - the trade database file path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - issues with getting the file path
